markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Gecko Potion](/Equipment.aspx?ID=714)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Potion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=130" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 257 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A gecko potion is a sticky, tawny brown liquid with flecks of sand suspended in it. For 5 minutes after drinking this potion, your fingertips sprout thousands of microscopic, bristled hairs that cling to objects, granting you a +1 item bonus to [Climb](/Actions.aspx?ID=33) and [Palm an Object](/Actions.aspx?ID=67), and to your Reflex DC against [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) attempts.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Gecko Potion
